error: type error
- testdata/err/bool_op_on_ints.tn:1:20
1 | main = || -> i32 { 1i32 & 0i32 };
  |                    ^^^^^^^^^^^
- testdata/err/bool_op_on_ints.tn:1:20
1 | main = || -> i32 { 1i32 & 0i32 };
  |                    ^^^^ expected :f|:t but got i32
- testdata/err/bool_op_on_ints.tn:1:27
1 | main = || -> i32 { 1i32 & 0i32 };
  |                           ---- other operand has type i32
